english: Ce issues statement on referendum motion
chinese: 行政长官重申政府对公投动议立场

english: Some called it a referendum , a term not used lightly in china
chinese: 有人称其为公投，两个在中国鲜见的字。

english: The spokesman pointed out that a referendum was also not appropriate
chinese: 发言人指出，公投也是不恰当的。

english: It was , he says , merely a way of canvassing public opinion
chinese: 他对中国媒体把这次表决描绘为公投很是恼火。

english: But we are opposed to referenda which would be a unilateral action
chinese: 但是，我们反对会成为单边行动的公投。
公投造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Chief executive issues statement on referendum motion 2004 - 11 - 15
chinese: 行政长官重申政府对公投动议立场2004年11月15日

english: Nearly 10 million iraqis cast ballots in the october 15 referendum
chinese: 将近1千万伊拉克人参加了10月15号的全民公投。

english: Referendum on constitutional development neither practical nor appropriate
chinese: 就政制发展进行公投既不切实际又不恰当

english: The government is very clear that it will not conduct a referendum on this matter
chinese: 所以，政府是不会就政制发展采取公投的方法。

english: Dr hon fernando cheung proposed a motion on referendum at the panel meeting
chinese: 在事务委员会的会议上，张超雄议员就公投提出议案。

english: The motion on referendum proposed by dr hon fernando cheung was negatived by the panel
chinese: 张超雄议员就公投提出的议案被事务委员会否决。

english: They did it again in 2005 , by rejecting the european union constitution in a referendum
chinese: 2005年，他们又如法炮制，以公投的方式否决了欧盟宪法。

english: France herself has in the past abused the force of referendums to prop up authoritarian regimes
chinese: 法国本身也曾经不当使用全民公投的力量来促成威权。
